00076 #define RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED 1U

00144 /*
00145  *  Initialization function which initializes the App internal data
00146  *  structures to default values. 
00147  */ 
00148 
00149 static void  RTC001_lInit(const RTC001_HandleType* Handle)
00150 {
00151   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00152    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_1>>> */
00153   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR &= (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00154                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00155                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00156   
00157   /* Enable alarm and periodic timer interrupts in SCU */
00158   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRMSK |= (((1U << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRMSK_PI_Pos) & SCU_INTERRUPT_SRMSK_PI_Msk) | \
00159                                                         ((1U << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRMSK_AI_Pos) & SCU_INTERRUPT_SRMSK_AI_Msk));
00160   
00161   if (Handle->RTCInitOnce != 1 || (((RTC->CTR & RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk) >> RTC_CTR_ENB_Pos) == 0 )) 
00162    {
00163      /* RTC disabled to set the time */
00164      RTC001_Disable();  
00165      /* Calendar time and date set in RTC registers */
00166      RTC001_Clock_SetTime(&timeptr1);
00167    }     
00168     /* The RTC module is enabled */
00169         RTC->CTR |= ((uint32_t)(RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk)); 
00170         /* Wait for SCU register updation */
00171     while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00172     /* Clear the update indication field in SCU register */
00173     SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos);
00174           
00175    
00176         RTC->CTR |= ((uint32_t)(RTC_CTR_TAE_Msk));
00177         /* Wait for SCU register updation */
00178     while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00179     /* Clear the update indication field in SCU register */
00180     SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos);
00181     
00182     /* Enables the Alarm interrupt and seconds comparison is set */
00183     RTC->MSKSR |=(((uint32_t)(1 << RTC_MSKSR_MAI_Pos)) & RTC_MSKSR_MAI_Msk);
00184     RTC->CTR |=((uint32_t)(RTC_CTR_ESEC_Msk));
00185     /* Wait for SCU register updation */
00186     while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00187     /* Clear the update indication field in SCU register */
00188     SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos);
00189         
00190      
00191            
00192         RTC->CTR |=((uint32_t)(RTC_CTR_ESEC_Msk));
00193         /* Wait for SCU register updation */
00194     while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00195     /* Clear the update indication field in SCU register */
00196     SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos);
00197         
00198         
00199         
00200         
00201         
00202         
00203         
00204         RTC->CTR |=((uint32_t)((Handle->DividerValue << RTC_CTR_DIV_Pos) & RTC_CTR_DIV_Msk));   
00205     /* Wait for SCU register updation */
00206     while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00207     /* Clear the update indication field in SCU register */
00208     SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos); 
00209         
00210         
00211          
00212         
00213          
00214    
00215     /* Register User defined Event Handler for Alarm function */  
00216     RTC001_ConfigAlarm(&RTC001_Handle,&Alarmptr1,Alarm_Interrupt,0);
00217 
00218   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00219 }

00257 
00258 /*
00259  *  The function enables the RTC module.
00260  */
00261 status_t  RTC001_Enable(void)
00262 {
00263   status_t status = RTC001_ERROR;
00264   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00265    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_3>>> */
00266  
00267   /* SCU register cleared */
00268   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR &= (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00269                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00270                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00271   /* RTC module enabled */
00272   RTC->CTR |= (RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk);
00273   while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00274   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos);  
00275   
00276   status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;     
00277   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00278   return status;
00279 }
00280 
00281 
00282 /*
00283  *  The function disables the RTC module.
00284  */
00285  
00286 status_t  RTC001_Disable(void)  
00287 {
00288   status_t status = RTC001_ERROR;
00289   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00290    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_4>>> */
00291 
00292   /* The RTC module is disabled*/
00293   RTC->CTR &= (~(RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk));
00294   while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos)));
00295   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_CTR_Pos);  
00296 
00297   /* The time register values are reset */
00298   RTC->TIM1 = 0x00000000;
00299   RTC->TIM0 = 0x00000000;
00300   while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (1 << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_TIM0_Pos)));
00301   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (1 << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_TIM0_Pos);
00302   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (1 << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_TIM1_Pos);
00303 
00304   /* The Alarm register values are reset */
00305   RTC->ATIM1 = 0x00000000;
00306   RTC->ATIM0 = 0x00000000;
00307   while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (1 << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_ATIM0_Pos)));
00308   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (1 << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_ATIM0_Pos);
00309   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (1 << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_ATIM1_Pos);
00310 
00311   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR &= (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00312                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00313                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00314                                                                 
00315   status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00316   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00317   return status;
00318 }
00319 
00320 
00321 /*
00322  *  The function gets RTC flag status.
00323  */     
00324 status_t  RTC001_GetFlagStatus(RTC001_FlagType Flag)
00325 {
00326   status_t status = RTC001_RESET;
00327   uint32_t TempValue = 0U;
00328   /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_6>>> */
00329   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00330         do
00331         {
00332                 if(Flag <= DAYS_FLAG)
00333                 {
00334                     /* Flag value captured */
00335                         TempValue = RTC->STSSR;
00336                         TempValue  &= (0x1U << Flag);
00337                 }
00338                 else if(Flag <= YEARS_FLAG)
00339                 {
00340                     /* Flag value captured */
00341                         TempValue = RTC->STSSR;
00342                         TempValue  &= (0x1U << ( (uint8_t)Flag + 0x01U));
00343                 }
00344                 else
00345                 {
00346                         /* Flag value captured */
00347                         TempValue = RTC->STSSR;
00348                         TempValue  &= (0x1U <<(((uint8_t)Flag) + 0x02U ));
00349                 } 
00350             if(TempValue != 0U)
00351             {
00352               status = RTC001_SET;
00353             }
00354 
00355         }while(0);
00356         FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00357         return status;
00358 }
00359 
00360 
00361 /*
00362  *  The function clears RTC flag status.
00363  */
00364 void  RTC001_ClearFlagStatus(RTC001_FlagType Flag)
00365 {
00366   /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_5>>> */
00367   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00368         do
00369         {
00370                 if(Flag <= DAYS_FLAG)
00371                 {
00372                         /* Flag value cleared */
00373                         RTC->CLRSR |= (0x01U << Flag);
00374                 }
00375                 else if(Flag <= YEARS_FLAG)
00376                 {
00377                         /* Flag value cleared */
00378                         RTC->CLRSR |= (0x01U << ((uint8_t) Flag + 0x01U));
00379                 }
00380                 else
00381                 {
00382                         /* Flag value cleared */
00383                         RTC->CLRSR |= (0x01U << ((uint8_t) (Flag + 0x02U )));
00384                 } 
00385 
00386         }while(0);
00387         FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00388 }
00389 
00390 
00391 /*
00392  *  Interface to config the alarm.
00393  */
00394 
00395 status_t RTC001_ConfigAlarm (const RTC001_HandleType* Handle, RTC001_TimeHandle* timeptr, AlarmCallBackPtr CallBack,uint32_t CbArg)
00396 {
00397   uint16_t m1 = 0,y1 = 0,d1 = 0,t1 = 0;
00398   status_t status = RTC001_ERROR;
00399   /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_11>>> */
00400   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00401   do
00402   {
00403    /* <<<DD_RTC001 _API_4>>> */
00404   /* Clearing SRCLR register */
00405   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR &= (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00406                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00407                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00408         /* Check null callback condition */                                                     
00409     if(CallBack == NULL)
00410     {
00411       status = RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE;
00412       ERROR(GID_RTC001,RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE, 0, NULL);
00413       break;
00414     }
00415         else
00416         {                                                       
00417           NVIC_SCU001_RegisterCallback(NVIC_SCU001_AI,CallBack,CbArg);
00418         }
00419         
00420   /*   Write values into ATIM0 and ATIM1 registers  */
00421 
00422     m1 = timeptr->Month;
00423     y1 = timeptr->Year;
00424     d1 = timeptr->Days;
00425     /* Check whether the date entered is valid */
00426     if (RTC001_ldatevalid(m1,d1,y1))
00427     { 
00428 
00429           t1 = ((uint32_t)(RTC001_lweekday(m1,d1,y1)));
00430           if(t1<6)
00431           {
00432             t1=(t1+1);
00433           }
00434           else if(t1==6)
00435           {
00436             t1=0;
00437           }
00438 
00439       RTC->ATIM0 = (((timeptr->Sec) & RTC_ATIM0_ASE_Msk) | ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Min) << RTC_ATIM0_AMI_Pos) & RTC_ATIM0_AMI_Msk) | \
00440       ((((uint32_t)timeptr->Hours) << RTC_ATIM0_AHO_Pos) & RTC_ATIM0_AHO_Msk) | \
00441       ((((uint32_t)((timeptr->Days)-1)) << RTC_ATIM0_ADA_Pos) & RTC_ATIM0_ADA_Msk));
00442 
00443       RTC->ATIM1 = ((t1) | (((uint32_t)((timeptr->Month)-1)) << RTC_ATIM1_AMO_Pos)|\
00444       (((uint32_t)timeptr->Year) << RTC_ATIM1_AYE_Pos));
00445 
00446           while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_ATIM0_Pos)));
00447       SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_ATIM0_Pos);   
00448       SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_ATIM1_Pos);
00449 
00450 
00451     }  
00452     else
00453     {
00454       status = RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE;
00455       ERROR(GID_RTC001,status, 0, NULL);
00456       break;
00457     }
00458     status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;   
00459   }while(0);
00460   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00461   return status;
00462 }
00463         
00464 
00465 /*
00466  *  Interface to get the RTC time at a particular instance.
00467  */
00468  
00469 status_t RTC001_Clock_GetTime (RTC001_TimeHandle* timeptr)
00470 {
00471   status_t status = RTC001_ERROR;
00472   uint32_t temp0,temp1;
00473   temp0 = RTC->TIM0;
00474   temp1 = RTC->TIM1;
00475   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00476    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_12>>> */
00477   /* Initialize the header of the list */
00478 
00479   /*   Read values from TIM0 and TIM1 registers  */
00480 
00481   /*   Days of Week value  */
00482         timeptr->DaWe = (uint8_t)(temp1 & RTC_TIM1_DAWE_Msk);
00483   /*   Month value  */
00484         timeptr->Month = (uint8_t)(((temp1 & RTC_TIM1_MO_Msk) >> RTC_TIM1_MO_Pos) + 1U);
00485   /*   Year value  */
00486         timeptr->Year = (uint32_t)((temp1 & RTC_TIM1_YE_Msk) >> RTC_TIM1_YE_Pos);
00487 
00488   /*   Seconds value  */
00489         timeptr->Sec =  (uint8_t)((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_SE_Msk));
00490   /*   Minutes value  */
00491         timeptr->Min = (uint8_t)(((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_MI_Msk) >> RTC_TIM0_MI_Pos));
00492   /*   Hours value  */
00493         timeptr->Hours = (uint8_t)(((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_HO_Msk) >> RTC_TIM0_HO_Pos));
00494   /*   Days value starting from the 1st day of the month */
00495         timeptr->Days = (uint8_t)(((temp0 & RTC_TIM0_DA_Msk) >> RTC_TIM0_DA_Pos) + 1U);
00496         status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00497   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00498   return status;
00499 }
00500 
00501 
00502 /*
00503  *  This function is to set the time.
00504  */
00505 status_t RTC001_Clock_SetTime(RTC001_TimeHandle* timeptr)
00506 {
00507   uint16_t m = 0,y =0,d = 0,t = 0;
00508   status_t status = RTC001_ERROR;
00509   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00510    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_13>>> */
00511   
00512   /*   Write values into TIM0 and TIM1 registers  */
00513 
00514   SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR &= (SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_CTR_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM0_Msk | \
00515                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_ATIM1_Msk | SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM0_Msk |\
00516                                                                 SCU_INTERRUPT_SRCLR_RTC_TIM1_Msk);
00517  
00518   /*   Days of Week value  */
00519   m = timeptr->Month;
00520   y = timeptr->Year;
00521   d = timeptr->Days;
00522   
00523   do
00524   {    
00525     if (RTC001_ldatevalid(m,d,y))  
00526     { 
00527           t = ((uint32_t)(RTC001_lweekday(m,d,y)));
00528           if(t<6)
00529           {
00530             t=(t+1);
00531           }
00532           else if(t==6)
00533           {
00534             t=0;
00535           }
00536       RTC->TIM1 = ((t) | (((uint32_t)((timeptr->Month)-1)) << 8U)|\
00537       (((uint32_t)timeptr->Year) << 16U));
00538 
00539       RTC->TIM0 = ((timeptr->Sec) | (((uint32_t)timeptr->Min) << 8U) | \
00540       (((uint32_t)timeptr->Hours) << 16U) | \
00541       (((uint32_t)((timeptr->Days)-1)) << 24U));
00542 
00543       while(!(SCU_INTERRUPT->SRRAW & (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_TIM0_Pos)));
00544       SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_TIM0_Pos);   
00545       SCU_INTERRUPT->SRCLR = (RTC001_UPDATE_COMPLETED << SCU_INTERRUPT_SRRAW_RTC_TIM1_Pos);
00546 
00547     }  
00548     else
00549     {
00550       status = RTC001_INVALID_HANDLE;
00551       ERROR(GID_RTC001,status, 0, NULL);
00552       break;
00553     }
00554    
00555   }while(0);
00556   status = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00557   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00558   return status;
00559 }
00560 
00561 
00562 /*
00563  *  This function is to get the time in seconds calculated from Epoc time.
00564  */
00565 
00566 status_t RTC001_Time(time_t* time)
00567 {
00568   uint8_t TimeMonthVar=0,TimeMonth1=0,TimeMonth2=0,TimeDay1=0,TimeDay2=0,TimeHour=0,TimeMinute=0,TimeSecond=0;
00569   uint32_t TimeMonthCalc1=0,TimeYear1=0,TimeYear2=0,TimeLpVar=0;
00570   uint32_t TimeYear3=0,TimeMonth3=0,TimeDay3=0,TimeHour2=0,TimeMinute2=0;
00571   uint8_t Count = 0U;
00572   uint32_t Temp_Value1 =0,Temp_Value2=0;
00573   time_t Time =0;
00574   status_t ReturnStatus;
00575   
00576   FUNCTION_ENTRY(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_ENTRY);
00577    /* <<<DD_RTC001_API_15>>> */
00578   do
00579   {
00580     if((RTC->CTR & (RTC_CTR_ENB_Msk)) == 0)
00581     {
00582       ReturnStatus = RTC001_ERROR;
00583       break;
00584     }
00585     if(time == NULL)
00586     {
00587       ReturnStatus = RTC001_ERROR;
00588       break;
00589     }
00590 
00591     /*   Read values from TIM0 and TIM1 registers  */
00592     TimeYear1 = ((uint32_t)((RTC->TIM1 & RTC_TIM1_YE_Msk) >> 16U));
00593     TimeMonth1 =        ((uint8_t)(((RTC->TIM1 & RTC_TIM1_MO_Msk) >> 8U) + 1U));
00594     TimeDay1 = ((uint8_t)(((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_DA_Msk) >> 24U) + 1U));
00595     TimeHour = ((uint8_t)(((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_HO_Msk) >> 16U)));
00596     TimeMinute = ((uint8_t)(((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_MI_Msk) >> 8U)));
00597     TimeSecond = ((uint8_t)((RTC->TIM0 & RTC_TIM0_SE_Msk)));
00598   
00599         /* Count the number of days to be adjusted for leap years, start from previous year */
00600     /*TimeLpYear = TimeYear1;*/
00601     for (TimeLpVar=(TimeYear1-1); TimeLpVar>= 1970U; TimeLpVar--)
00602     {
00603       if((((TimeLpVar) % 400) ==0) || ((((TimeLpVar) % 100) != 0) && (((TimeLpVar) %4) == 0)))
00604       {
00605         Count++;
00606       }
00607     }
00608     /*if current year is leap year add 1 only if March or later*/
00609     if((((TimeYear1) % 400) ==0) || ((((TimeYear1) % 100) != 0) && (((TimeYear1) %4) == 0)))
00610     {
00611           if(TimeMonth1 > 2)
00612           {
00613                 Count++;
00614           }
00615     }
00616 
00617     Temp_Value1 = (Count * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);
00618 
00619         /* Difference Calculation */
00620     TimeYear2 = (TimeYear1 - (0x7B2U));
00621     TimeMonth2 = (TimeMonth1 - (1U));
00622     TimeDay2 = (TimeDay1 - (1U));
00623         
00624     /* Calculation of seconds for ordinary year */
00625     TimeYear3 = (TimeYear2 * 0x16DU * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);
00626   /* Calculation of seconds for ordinary month */
00627     for (TimeMonthVar=TimeMonth2;TimeMonthVar>=1U;TimeMonthVar--)
00628     {
00629       if((TimeMonthVar <= 7) && ((TimeMonthVar % 2) == 1))
00630       {
00631         TimeMonthCalc1 = (1U * 0x1FU * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);          /* 31*/
00632           }
00633           if((TimeMonthVar <= 7) && ((TimeMonthVar % 2) == 0))
00634           {
00635             if(TimeMonthVar == 2)
00636             {
00637               TimeMonthCalc1 = (1U * 0x1CU * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);     /* 28*/
00638             }
00639             else
00640             {
00641               TimeMonthCalc1 = (1U * 0x1EU * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);       /* 30*/
00642             }
00643           }
00644           if((TimeMonthVar > 7) && ((TimeMonthVar % 2) == 0))
00645           {
00646         TimeMonthCalc1 = (1U * 0x1EU * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);           /* 30*/
00647           }
00648           if((TimeMonthVar > 7) && ((TimeMonthVar % 2) == 1))
00649           {
00650             TimeMonthCalc1 = (1U * 0x1FU * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);               /* 31*/
00651           }
00652       TimeMonth3 = TimeMonth3 + TimeMonthCalc1;
00653     }
00654         /* Calculation of seconds for ordinary day */
00655     TimeDay3 = (TimeDay2 * 0x18U * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);
00656         /* Calculation of seconds for ordinary hour */
00657     TimeHour2 = (TimeHour * 0x3CU * 0x3CU);
00658         /* Calculation of seconds for ordinary minute */
00659     TimeMinute2 = (TimeMinute * 0x3CU);
00660         /* Calculation of seconds for ordinary second */
00661         
00662     Temp_Value2 = (TimeYear3 + TimeMonth3 + TimeDay3 + TimeHour2 + TimeMinute2 + TimeSecond);
00663     Time = Temp_Value1 + Temp_Value2;
00664     *time = Time;
00665     ReturnStatus = DAVEApp_SUCCESS;
00666 
00667   }
00668   while(0);
00669   FUNCTION_EXIT(GID_RTC001,RTC001_FUNCTION_EXIT);
00670   return ReturnStatus;
00671 }
00672 /*   return 1 if date is valid, 0 otherwise.    */
00673 uint32_t RTC001_ldatevalid(uint16_t m,uint16_t d,uint16_t y)
00674 {
00675     if ((m <= 0) || (m > 12) )
00676     {
00677       return 0;
00678     }
00679     if (m != 2) 
00680     {
00681       if ( (d <= 0) || (d > 31) )
00682       {
00683         return 0;
00684       }
00685       if ( (m == 4) || (m == 6) || (m == 9) || (m == 11) )
00686       {
00687         if ( d > 30 )
00688         {
00689           return 0;
00690         }
00691         else
00692         {
00693           return 1;
00694         }
00695       }
00696     }
00697     else 
00698     {
00699       if ( d > 29 )
00700       { 
00701         return 0;
00702       } 
00703       if ( d < 29 )
00704       {
00705         return 1;
00706       } 
00707       if ((((y) % 400U) ==0) || ((((y) % 100U) != 0) && (((y) %4U) == 0)))
00708       {
00709         return 1;
00710       }
00711       else 
00712       {
00713         return 0;
00714       }
00715     }
00716     return 1;
00717 }
00718 
00719 /* given month, day, year, returns day of week, eg. Monday = 0 etc.
00720  tested for 1901 to 2099 (seems to work from 1800 on too)*/ 
00721 
00722 uint32_t RTC001_lweekday(uint16_t m,uint16_t d,uint16_t y)
00723 {
00724     int vx, tx, ix, feb;
00725     uint8_t vx_list[] = {0, 20, 0, 16, 24, 20, 0, 24, 4, 12, 8, 16, 12,};
00726 
00727     vx = vx_list[m];
00728     if(y > 1900)
00729     {
00730       y = y - 1900;
00731     }
00732     feb = m  > 2 ;
00733     ix = ((y - 21) % 28) + vx + feb; // take care of February 
00734     tx = ((ix + (ix / 4)) % 7) + d; // take care of leap year
00735     return (tx % 7);
00736 }
